    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Új életforma</string>
            <string language="en">new way of life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">neue Lebensart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nouvelle façon de vivre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">maneira de vida nova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nuovo modo di vivere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νέος τρόπος της ζωής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nueva manera de la vida</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Letelepedés, városiasodás, földművelés-állattenyésztés</string>
            <string language="en">Settlement, urbanisation, agriculture, animal husbandry</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">neolitikum,  földművelés,  állattenyésztés,  letelepedés,  történelem,  Kr.e. 10-6. évezred,  </string>
            <string language="en">neolithic ages, agriculture, animal husbandry, settlement, history, 10th-6th century B.C.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelung, Verfeinerung, Landwirtschaft, 
Viehwirtschaft</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règlement, urbanisation, agriculture, production
animale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estabelecimento, urbanisation, agricultura, 
husbandry animal</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stabilimento, urbanizzazione, agricoltura, 
agricoltura animale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τακτοποίηση, αστικοποίηση, γεωργία, κτηνοτροφική 
παραγωγή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Establecimiento, urbanización, agricultura, 
agricultura animal</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">neolithisches Alter, Landwirtschaft, Viehwirtschaft, 
Regelung, Geschichte, 10.-. Jahrhundert B.C.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">âges néolithiques, agriculture, production animale, 
règlement, histoire, 10ème-6ème siècle B.C.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">idades neolithic, agricultura, husbandry animal, 
estabelecimento, history, 10o-õ século B.C.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">età neolithic, agricoltura, agricoltura animale, 
stabilimento, storia, decimo-sesto secolo B.C.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νεολιθικές ηλικίες, γεωργία, κτηνοτροφική παραγωγή, 
τακτοποίηση, ιστορία, 10ος-6ος αιώνας Π.Χ.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">edades neolíticas, agricultura, agricultura animal, 
establecimiento, historia, 10mo-õ siglo B.C.</string>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
